com.rscja.deviceapi.interfaces

Interface IBluetoothReader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BluetoothReader, RFIDWithUHFBLE

    public interface IBluetoothReader
    蓝牙读写器的接口
    Interface of Bluetooth reader.

      • getBluetoothVersion

        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getBluetoothVersion()
        获取蓝牙版本号(acquire Bluetooth version)
        Returns:
        key:VERSION_BT_FIRMWARE 表示固件版本(Firmware Version), key:VERSION_BT_HARDWARE 表示硬件版本(Hardware version) ， key:VERSION_BT_SOFTWARE 表示软件版本(software version)

      • getBattery

        int getBattery()
        获取电池电量(Acquire battery capacity)
        Returns:
        返回电量，-1表示获取电量失败(return battery capacity, -1 means acquire failure.)

      • setBeep

        boolean setBeep(boolean isOpen)
        设置蜂鸣器开关(Setup buzzer ON/OFF)
        Parameters:
        isBeep - true:打开蜂鸣器(ON)， false:关闭蜂鸣器(OFF)
        Returns:
        true:成功(success) false:失败(failure)
